mapper.insert: INSERT INTO StoreInfo ( title, address1, address2, address3, address4, address5, address6, postcode, xPosition, yPosition, phone1, phone2, information, website, blog, time, representImage, category, wideBanner ) VALUES ( '${title}', '${address1}', '${address2}', '${address3}', '${address4}', '${address5}', '${address6}', '${postcode}', '${xPosition}', '${yPosition}', '${phone1}', '${phone2}', '${information}', '${website}', '${blog}', '${time}', ${representImage}, ${category}, ${wideBanner} )
mapper.select:
SELECT s.*, c.title AS categoryTitle, p.id AS wideBanner, p.url AS wideBannerUrl, b.bannerText, b.bannerColor, (SELECT color FROM BannerColor WHERE id = b.bannerColor ) AS bannerColorTxt FROM StoreInfo s LEFT JOIN Category c ON s.category = c.id LEFT JOIN PhotoInfo p ON s.wideBanner = p.id LEFT JOIN StoreBanner b ON s.id = b.storeId
s.priority > 0
and s.category = ${category}
and ( s.title like '%${query}%' or s.phone1 like '%${query}%' or s.phone2 like '%${query}%' ) or ( s.id IN ( SELECT storeId FROM StoreHash WHERE hashId = (SELECT id FROM HashTag WHERE name = '${query}') ) )
ORDER BY s.priority ASC

SELECT s.*, (SELECT color FROM BannerColor WHERE id = b.bannerColor ) AS bannerColorTxt, c.title AS categoryTitle FROM StoreInfo s LEFT JOIN Category c ON s.category = c.id LEFT JOIN StoreBanner b ON s.id = b.storeId

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM StoreInfo s
s.priority > 0
and s.category = ${category}
and ( s.title like '%${query}%' or s.phone1 like '%${query}%' or s.phone2 like '%${query}%' ) or ( s.id IN ( SELECT storeId FROM StoreHash WHERE hashId = (SELECT id FROM HashTag WHERE name = '${query}') ) )

SELECT s.*, c.title AS categoryTitle, (SELECT color FROM BannerColor WHERE id = b.bannerColor ) AS bannerColorTxt, (SELECT thumbnailUrl FROM PhotoInfo WHERE id = s.representImage) AS representImageUrl, (SELECT url FROM PhotoInfo WHERE id = s.wideBanner) AS wideBannerUrl, b.bannerText FROM StoreInfo s LEFT JOIN Category c ON s.category = c.id LEFT JOIN StoreBanner b ON s.id = b.storeId
s.id = ${id}
